Title: Sonatas
Writer: Juan Antonio Bardem, Juan de la Cabada (Mexican segment), José Revueltas (Mexican segment), Ramón del Valle-Inclán (books)
Actors: María Félix, Francisco Rabal, Aurora Bautista, Fernando Rey
Plot: "Ugly, Catholic and sentimental", Javier de Montenegro is best known for the noble title he holds: that of Marqués de Bradomín. Rid of dying on the gallows thanks to Captain Casares, ...
